_header: Beware how thou the body cut
_description: Warnings about when to and when not to let blood — seven couplets

HunHM64.First Lines:
BIware howe thou the body keytte ffor the blode may not to faste
                    out fleitte…
HunHM64.Last Lines:
…An evill daye & an evill howreAnd the signe that dothe no
                    socowre
HunHM64.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 240.
